flavor: The elite soldier of the Imperial Military, trained for complete obedience to the command hierarchy, as well as the Galactic Emperor Palpatine.
name: Veteran Stormtrooper
Boba Fett
subtitle: Deadly Mercenary
text: [special] - Deal damage to a character equal to the value showing on a die (yours or an opponent's).

name: Doctor Aphra
subtitle: Artifact Hunter
text: The cost of the first droid you play each round is decreased by 1. After you deal indirect damage ([indirect]) to yourself, you may draw a card.

name: BT-1
text: After you activate this support, deal 1 indirect damage ([indirect]) to yourself. Then deal 1 indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent.

flavor: "I want to learn the ways of the Force and become a Jedi like my father."
name: Luke Skywalker
subtitle: Unlikely Hero
text: Power Action - Spend 2 resources to resolve one of this character's character or upgrade dice, increasing its value by 2.

name: Obi-Wan Kenobi
subtitle: Jedi Master
text: After you activate this character, you may give a character 1 shield.

name: Obi-Wan Kenobi's Lightsaber
text:
Blue character only.
[special] - Give attached character 1 shield. Deal unblockable damage to a character equal to the number of shields on attached character.

name: Wedge Antilles
subtitle: Squad Leader
text: Power Action - Turn one of your vehicle dice to any side.

name: Resistance Bomber
text:
After this die is resolved, place 1 damage on this support.
Discard this support if it has 3 or more damage on it.

flavor: "Hokey religions and ancient weapons are no match for a good blaster at your side, kid."
name: Han Solo
subtitle: Savvy Smuggler
text: After you activate this character, you may reroll a die (yours or an opponent's).

flavor: "That was fun. Let's never do that again." <cite>Doctor Aphra</cite>
name: Delve
text: Deal 1 indirect damage ([indirect]) to yourself to play a support or upgrade from your hand for free.

name: Bubble Shield
text:
You may distribute indirect damage ([indirect]) to this support as if it were a character with 3 health.
Discard this support if it has 3 or more damage on it.

name: Espionage
text: After setup, discard the top card from each deck.

name: Profitable Connection
text: You start the game with 1 additional resource.
